verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses בֹּ֖א <WH935> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> in unto Pharaoh וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> and tell אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> that they may serve

כִּ֛י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if מָאֵ֥ן <WH3986> For if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לְשַׁלֵּ֑חַ <WH7971> to let [them] go וְעוֹדְךָ֖ <WH5750> and continue מַחֲזִ֥יק <WH2388> and wilt hold בָּֽם׃

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold יַד־ <WH3027> Behold the hand יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD הוֹיָ֗ה <WH1961> is בְּמִקְנְךָ֙ <WH4735> upon thy cattle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> which [is] in the field בַּסּוּסִ֤ים <WH5483> upon the horses בַּֽחֲמֹרִים֙ <WH2543> upon the asses בַּגְּמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> upon the camels בַּבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> upon the oxen וּבַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> and upon the sheep דֶּ֖בֶר <WH1698> murrain כָּבֵ֥ד <WH3515> grievous מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [there shall be] a very

וְהִפְלָ֣ה <WH6395> shall sever יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between מִקְנֵ֣ה <WH4735> between the cattle יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between מִקְנֵ֣ה <WH4735> and the cattle מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָמ֛וּת <WH4191> die מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of all לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of all [that is] the children's יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> and there shall nothing

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> appointed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD מוֹעֵ֣ד <WH4150> a set time לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מָחָ֗ר <WH4279> To morrow יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <WH6213> shall do יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> that thing הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> on the morrow וַיָּ֕מָת <WH4191> died כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and all מִקְנֵ֣ה <WH4735> and all the cattle מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וּמִמִּקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> but of the cattle בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹא־ <WH3808> not מֵ֥ת <WH4191> died אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> not one

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> and behold לֹא־ <WH3808> not מֵ֛ת <WH4191> dead מִמִּקְנֵ֥ה <WH4735> of the cattle יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of the Israelites עַד־ <WH5704> even אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> and behold there was not one וַיִּכְבַּד֙ <WH3513> was hardened לֵ֣ב <WH3820> And the heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שִׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> and he did not let the people פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and אַהֲרֹן֒ <WH175> and unto Aaron קְח֤וּ <WH3947> Take לָכֶם֙ מְלֹ֣א <WH4393> all along חָפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2651> fists פִּ֖יחַ <WH6368> of ashes כִּבְשָׁ֑ן <WH3536> of the furnace וּזְרָק֥וֹ <WH2236> sprinkle מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> and let Moses הַשָּׁמַ֖יְמָה <WH8064> it toward the heaven לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight פַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> of Pharaoh

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> will become לְאָבָ֔ק <WH80> And it shall become small dust עַ֖ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> and will become עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָדָ֜ם <WH120> upon man וְעַל־ <WH5921> over הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> and upon beast לִשְׁחִ֥ין <WH7822> and shall be a boil פֹּרֵ֛חַ <WH6524> breaking forth אֲבַעְבֻּעֹ֖ת <WH76> [with] blains בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיִּקְח֞וּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֣יחַ <WH6368> ashes הַכִּבְשָׁ֗ן <WH3536> of the furnace וַיַּֽעַמְדוּ֙ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וַיִּזְרֹ֥ק <WH2236> sprinkled אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> and Moses הַשָּׁמָ֑יְמָה <WH8064> it up toward heaven וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> became שְׁחִין֙ <WH7822> and it became a boil אֲבַעְבֻּעֹ֔ת <WH76> [with] blains פֹּרֵ֕חַ <WH6524> breaking forth בָּאָדָ֖ם <WH120> upon man וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> and upon beast

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָכְל֣וּ <WH3201> could הַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֗ים <WH2748> And the magicians לַעֲמֹ֛ד <WH5975> not stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because הַשְּׁחִ֑ין <WH7822> of the boils כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become הַשְּׁחִ֔ין <WH7822> for the boil בַּֽחֲרְטֻמִּ֖ם <WH2748> was upon the magicians וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> Egyptian

וַיְחַזֵּ֤ק <WH2388> hardened יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> the heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> and he hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had spoken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> not unto them as the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> unto Moses ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> Rise up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <WH3320> and stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before פַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <WH5647> that they may serve

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> For I will at this time הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> likewise אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I שֹׁלֵ֜חַ <WH7971> send אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַגֵּפֹתַי֙ <WH4046> all my plagues אֶֽל־ <WH413> upon לִבְּךָ֔ <WH3820> upon thine heart וּבַעֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> and upon thy servants וּבְעַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> and upon thy people בַּעֲב֣וּר <WH5668> so תֵּדַ֔ע <WH3045> that thou mayest know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֵ֥ין <WH369> there כָּמֹ֖נִי <WH3644> like בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> that [there is] none like me in all the earth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now שָׁלַ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> For now I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֔י <WH3027> my hand וָאַ֥ךְ <WH5221> that I may smite אוֹתְךָ֛ <WH853> וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֖ <WH5971> thee and thy people בַּדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> with pestilence וַתִּכָּחֵ֖ד <WH3582> and thou shalt be cut off מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> from the earth

וְאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> And in very בַּעֲב֥וּר <WH5668> deed זֹאת֙ <WH2063> you הֶעֱמַדְתִּ֔יךָ <WH5975> for this [cause] have I raised thee up בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> order הַרְאֹתְךָ֣ <WH7200> for to shew אֶת־ <WH853> כֹּחִ֑י <WH3581> [in] thee my power וּלְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> order סַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> may be declared שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> and that my name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> throughout all the earth
עוֹדְךָ֖ <WH5750> Still מִסְתּוֹלֵ֣ל <WH5549> As yet exaltest בְּעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> thou thyself against my people לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not שַׁלְּחָֽם׃ <WH7971> that thou wilt not let them go

הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold מַמְטִיר֙ <WH4305> I will cause it to rain כָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> about this time מָחָ֔ר <WH4279> Behold to morrow בָּרָ֖ד <WH1259> hail כָּבֵ֣ד <WH3515> grievous מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> a very אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> such לֹא־ <WH3808> has not הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> been כָמֹ֙הוּ֙ <WH3644> such as hath not been בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt לְמִן־ <WH4480> since הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> the day הִוָּסְדָ֖ה <WH3245> founded וְעַד־ <WH5704> until עָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> now

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> Send הָעֵז֙ <WH5756> therefore now [and] gather אֶֽת־ <WH853> מִקְנְךָ֔ <WH4735> thy cattle וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> Every אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לְךָ֖ בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> and all that thou hast in the field כָּל־ <WH3605> Every הָאָדָ֨ם <WH120> [for upon] every man וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <WH929> and beast אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> is יִמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> which shall be found בַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> in the field וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not יֵֽאָסֵף֙ <WH622> and shall not be brought הַבַּ֔יְתָה <WH1004> home וְיָרַ֧ד <WH3381> shall come down עֲלֵהֶ֛ם <WH5921> when הַבָּרָ֖ד <WH1259> the hail וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> upon them and they shall die

הַיָּרֵא֙ <WH3372> feared אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מֵֽעַבְדֵ֖י <WH5650> among the servants פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh הֵנִ֛יס <WH5127> flee אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> made his servants וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <WH4735> and his cattle אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבָּתִּֽים׃ <WH1004> into the houses

וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> no שָׂ֛ם <WH7760> paid לִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> care for אֶל־ <WH413> to דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> not the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיַּעֲזֹ֛ב <WH5800> left אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> his servants וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵ֖הוּ <WH4735> and his cattle בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> in the field פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁה <WH4872> unto Moses נְטֵ֤ה <WH5186> Stretch forth אֶת־ <WH853> יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> toward הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> toward heaven וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> may fall בָרָ֖ד <WH1259> that there may be hail בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עַל־ <WH5921> toward הָאָדָ֣ם <WH120> upon man וְעַל־ <WH5921> toward הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> and upon beast וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> toward כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥שֶׂב <WH6212> and upon every herb הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיֵּ֨ט <WH5186> stretched forth מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> מַטֵּהוּ֮ <WH4294> his rod עַל־ <WH5921> toward הַשָּׁמַיִם֒ <WH8064> toward heaven וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> and the LORD נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> sent קֹלֹת֙ <WH6963> thunder וּבָרָ֔ד <WH1259> and hail וַתִּ֥הֲלַךְ <WH1980> ran along אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> and the fire אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> upon the ground וַיַּמְטֵ֧ר <WH4305> rained יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD בָּרָ֖ד <WH1259> hail עַל־ <WH5921> toward אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> upon the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> been בָרָ֔ד <WH1259> So there was hail וְאֵ֕שׁ <WH784> and fire מִתְלַקַּ֖חַת <WH3947> flashing בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> mingled הַבָּרָ֑ד <WH1259> with the hail כָּבֵ֣ד <WH3515> grievous מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> such לֹֽא־ <WH3808> such as there was none הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> became כָמֹ֙הוּ֙ <WH3644> in בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> like it in all the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מֵאָ֖ז <WH227> for הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> became לְגֽוֹי׃ <WH1471> since it became a nation

וַיַּ֨ךְ <WH5221> smote הַבָּרָ֜ד <WH1259> And the hail בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that was בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> all that [was] in the field מֵאָדָ֖ם <WH120> both man וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <WH929> and beast וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֤שֶׂב <WH6212> every herb הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> smote הַבָּרָ֔ד <WH1259> and the hail וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> every tree הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field שִׁבֵּֽר׃ <WH7665> and brake

רַ֚ק <WH7535> in בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> Only in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <WH1657> of Goshen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> where the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> no הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become בָּרָֽד׃ <WH1259> [were] was there no hail
